item.title: 美国证券交易委员会叫停因加密货币财政计划而上涨 959% 的公司交易
item.description: 在 QMMM Holdings Ltd. 的股价在不到三周的时间里暴涨近 1000% 之后，美国证券交易委员会暂停了该公司的交易，称这家数字媒体广告公司的股票可能受到了社交媒体上兜售者的操纵。【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission suspended trading in QMMM Holdings Ltd. after its shares surged almost 1,000% in less than three weeks, saying the digital media advertising firm’s stock may have been manipulated by touts on social media.】

item.title: 美国银行预计 10 月份小额债券供应将反弹
item.description: 市政债券市场最大的承销商预计，在本月国家和地方政府借款放缓之后，10 月份该资产类别的债务销售将有所增加。【原文：The municipal-bond market’s biggest underwriter expects an increase in debt sales in October after the asset class saw state and local government borrowing slow this month.】

item.title: 美联储穆萨莱姆称决策者必须谨慎对待降息
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行行长阿尔贝托-穆萨莱姆表示，他对进一步降息持开放态度，但决策者应谨慎行事，因为通胀率仍高于央行的目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President Alberto Musalem said he’s open to further interest rate cuts but policymakers should move carefully, with inflation still running above the central bank’s target.】

item.title: 美国打击被制裁企业的子公司，招致中国反击
item.description: 特朗普政府正在大幅扩大美国的制裁范围，将黑名单上公司的子公司也包括在内；这一打击行动迅速招致了中国的斥责，因为中国的主要科技巨头已经受到了美国严格的贸易限制。【原文：The Trump administration is dramatically expanding US sanctions to capture subsidiaries of blacklisted companies — a crackdown that drew a swift rebuke from China, where key tech giants are already subject to stringent American trade curbs.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会就对冲基金3.5亿美元倒闭起诉布莱恩-卡恩
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会起诉了 Franchise Group Inc.【原文：The US Securities and Exchange Commission sued Brian Kahn, the former head of Franchise Group Inc., over the collapse of a hedge fund that he helped run.】

item.title: 摩根大通 200 亿美元的 EA 支票标志着对私人信贷的胜利
item.description: 以 550 亿美元私有化电子艺界公司（Electronic Arts Inc.其中包括摩根大通公司提供的 200 亿美元融资，这是单家银行为此类交易做出的最大债务承诺。【原文：The $55 billion take-private of Electronic Arts Inc. has already launched a number of superlatives, including being heralded as the biggest leveraged buyout of all time. Part of that list, is JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s $20 billion of financing — the largest debt commitment ever by a single bank for such a deal.】

item.title: 人类学家称新模型可连续 30 小时独立编码
item.description: Anthropic公司正在发布一种新的人工智能模型，这种模型的编码时间比以前的版本更长、更有效，这是该公司在为软件开发者提供工具方面领先于OpenAI等竞争对手的最新尝试。该公司周一表示，这款名为 "克劳德-十四行诗 4.5"（Claude Sonnet 4.5）的新模型更善于听从指令，可以连续独立编码长达 30 个小时。相比之下，前一款名为 Claude Opus 4 的型号据说可以执行长达 7 小时的编码任务。【原文：Anthropic is releasing a new artificial intelligence model that is designed to code longer and more effectively than prior versions, its latest attempt to stay ahead of rivals like OpenAI in offering tools for software developers. The new model, called Claude Sonnet 4.5, is better at following instructions and can code on its own for up to 30 hours straight, the company said on Monday. By comparison, a previous model called Claude Opus 4 is said to be able to field coding tasks for up to seven h】

item.title: 道明集团承诺削减数十亿成本，重新推出指导原则
item.description: 多伦多道明银行（Toronto-Dominion Bank）正在恢复增长指导，其目标与美国洗钱丑闻之前的目标相似，该银行承诺削减数十亿美元的年度成本，并通过吸引更多客户和向他们销售更多产品来增加收入。【原文：Toronto-Dominion Bank is reinstating guidance on growth — with similar targets to those in place before a US money-laundering scandal — as it pledges to slash billions in annual costs and boost revenue through a push to attract more clients and sell them additional products.】

item.title: 墨西哥 120 亿美元援助 Pemex 的协议有望刺激更多 P-Caps 公司上市
item.description: 墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）是世界上负债最多的石油巨头，该公司曾使用一种不起眼的融资工具来削减债务，如今这种工具正成为其他陷入困境的借款人的学习榜样。【原文：An obscure financing tool used to chip away at the obligations of the world’s most indebted oil major, Petroleos Mexicanos, is now emerging as a model for other struggling borrowers.】

item.title: 货船在也门沿海遭到袭击后起火
item.description: 一艘货船在也门附近被爆炸装置击中并起火，两名海员受伤。【原文：A cargo ship was hit by an explosive device near Yemen and caught fire, injuring two seafarers.】

item.title: 想在英国定居的外籍劳工面临更严格的新测试
item.description: 工党周一宣布，在英国工作的外籍人士需要两倍的时间才能获得永久居留权，移民需要通过 "一系列新的测试 "来证明他们能够成为良好的公民。【原文：Foreign workers in the UK will need twice as long to quality for permanent residency, Labour announced on Monday, and migrants will be need to pass a “series of new tests” to prove they can be good citizens.】

item.title: 俄罗斯希望以低于欧洲和土耳其的价格向中国出售天然气
item.description: 俄罗斯预计向中国销售天然气的利润将低于西行出口，这凸显了克里姆林宫日益依赖亚洲国家的弊端。【原文：Russia expects its natural gas sales to China to be less lucrative than westbound exports, underscoring the downside to the Kremlin’s growing reliance on the Asian nation.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官称可能出售部分阿达尼绿色公司股份
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）首席执行官帕特里克-普瓦纳（Patrick Pouyanne）表示，这家法国能源巨头可能会出售其在阿达尼绿色能源有限公司（Adani Green Energy Ltd.）的部分股份，以利用这家印度可再生能源生产商不断上涨的估值。【原文：TotalEnergies SE Chief Executive Officer Patrick Pouyanne said the French energy giant may sell part of its stake in Adani Green Energy Ltd. to capitalize on the Indian renewable producer’s rising valuation.】

item.title: 比利时监管机构称 Nyrstar 在重组前就流动性问题误导市场
item.description: 前债权人 Trafigura 集团于 2019 年接管的锌铅冶炼厂 Nyrstar 因涉嫌在陷入重组前提供有关其流动性基础的 "误导性信息 "而被罚款 8 万欧元（9.38 万美元）。【原文：Nyrstar, the zinc and lead smelter which former creditor Trafigura Group took over in 2019, was fined €80,000 ($93,800) for allegedly providing “misleading information” about its liquidity base before sliding into a restructuring.】

item.title: 失去信用评级，度假租赁公司阿瓦兹债务下滑
item.description: 本月穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）撤销了对这家由 Platinum Equity LLC 支持的公司的评级，使其债务失去了公共信用评级，从而导致欧洲最大的度假村租赁公司 Awaze 的贷款定价急剧下降。【原文：Europe’s largest holiday rentals and resorts business Awaze’s loan pricing has plummeted after Moody’s Ratings withdrew its coverage of the Platinum Equity LLC-backed firm this month to leave the debt without a public credit rating.】

item.title: 贝莱德的 IBIT 超越 Deribit 成为顶级比特币期权交易场所
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc. ）的iShares Bitcoin Trust已超过Coinbase Global Inc.的Deribit平台，成为最大的比特币期权交易平台，这凸显了数字资产市场的重心正在从离岸平台向华尔街转移。【原文：BlackRock Inc.’s iShares Bitcoin Trust has overtaken Coinbase Global Inc.’s Deribit platform as the largest venue for Bitcoin options, underscoring how the center of gravity in digital-asset markets is shifting from offshore platforms to Wall Street.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚最高外交官以 "尊严之举 "放弃美国签证
item.description: 哥伦比亚外交部长表示，在华盛顿撤销古斯塔沃-彼得罗总统的签证后，她将放弃美国签证，以示 "尊严"。【原文：Colombia’s foreign minister said she’ll renounce her US visa in an “act of dignity” after Washington revoked President Gustavo Petro’s permit.】

item.title: 沃姆斯利的 "梦幻招聘 "亟需找到 "大片 "药物
item.description: 将近九年前，当艾玛-沃姆斯利准备接任葛兰素史克公司首席执行官时，她在日记中写道，卢克-米尔斯（Luke Miels —），当时是竞争对手阿斯利康公司（AstraZeneca Plc —）的高管，将是 "这次冒险的梦想任命"。【原文：Nearly nine years ago, when Emma Walmsley was preparing to take over as CEO of GSK Plc, she wrote in her diary that Luke Miels — then an executive at rival AstraZeneca Plc — would be “a dream appointment for this adventure.”】

item.title: 瑞典反击默茨要求取消欧盟内燃机禁令的呼吁
item.description: 瑞典将反对德国推动淡化欧盟 2035 年有效禁止在新车中使用内燃机的最后期限，认为此举将惩罚那些在绿色转型中作出重大投资的汽车制造商。【原文：Sweden will oppose a push by Germany to water down the European Union’s 2035 deadline to effectively ban combustion engines in new vehicles, arguing that such a move would punish those carmakers that have made major investments in the green transition.】

item.title: Meta 的人工智能图像合作伙伴 Black Forest Labs 正在洽谈估值 40 亿美元的融资事宜
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德国人工智能初创企业黑森林实验室（Black Forest Labs）正在讨论融资事宜，这可能会将其估值提高到 40 亿美元左右。【原文：German artificial intelligence startup Black Forest Labs is in discussions to raise funding that could boost its valuation to around $4 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 加纳 8 月可可到货量翻两番，因为可可季提前开始
item.description: 加纳 8 月份可可入仓量比去年同期翻了两番多，原因是可可种植季加速开始，提前为农民提供了现金，使供应量增加，从而冷却了全球价格。【原文：Ghana’s cocoa deliveries to warehouses in August more than quadrupled from the same period last year as an accelerated start to the season provided early cash to farmers, adding to the uptick in supply that’s cooling global prices.】

item.title: 瑞士向特朗普提供黄金甜头以获得更好的关税协议
item.description:
瑞士提出投资美国黄金提炼业，试图说服特朗普政府降低关税

。【原文：

Switzerland has offered to invest in US gold refining, as it tries to persuade the Trump administration to lower tariffs

】

item.title: 巴伐利亚北欧公司竞标者延长报价截止日期，维持价格不变
item.description: Nordic Capital 和 Permira 延长了对巴伐利亚北欧公司（Bavarian Nordic A/S）的收购要约期，同时坚持原来的收购价格，尽管主要投资者反对对这家丹麦疫苗生产商的估值，但这两家公司仍然坚持收购。【原文：Nordic Capital and Permira extended the offer period for their Bavarian Nordic A/S takeover bid while sticking with their original price tag, holding firm despite pushback from key investors opposed to the valuation of the Danish vaccine maker.】

item.title: 苏斯克汉纳称，博鳌亚洲论坛看涨期权诱人，有望在年底大涨
item.description: 美国股市今年将再创辉煌，在还剩一个季度的时候，苏斯克汉纳国际集团（Susquehanna International Group）衍生品策略师克里斯托弗-雅各布森（Christopher Jacobson）开始寻找牛市中能够提高收益的方法。【原文：With one quarter left in what’s shaping up as another stellar year for US equities, Susquehanna International Group derivatives strategist Christopher Jacobson went looking for ways bulls can supercharge returns.】

item.description:

item.title: 俄罗斯面临战时预算冲击，石油和天然气收入将下滑
item.description: 在石油和天然气燃料价格下跌、卢布升值之后，俄罗斯政府预计今年石油和天然气行业对国家预算的贡献将降至 2020 年大流行病以来的最低水平。【原文：The Russian government expects the oil and gas industries’ contributions to the national budget this year to drop to the lowest since the pandemic of 2020 after prices for its fuels dipped and the ruble strengthened.】

item.title: 9 月份美国垃圾债券发行量接近史上最繁忙的第五个月
item.description: 本月美国垃圾债券市场供应的无情冲击预计将在周一晚些时候推动 9 月份的交易量达到 510 亿美元，使其成为有记录以来交易量第五大的月份。【原文：The relentless onslaught of supply in the US junk bond market this month is expected to drive September volume to $51 billion later on Monday, making it the fifth-busiest month on record.】

item.title: 如果关键数据因停摆而延迟，美国经济只会变得更加扑朔迷离
item.description: 立法者正急于让联邦政府关门，这可能使政策制定者、商界领袖和投资者无法获得评估美国经济状况所需的关键数据。【原文：Lawmakers are careening toward a shutdown of the federal government that could deprive policymakers, business leaders and investors of critical data they need to assess the state of the US economy.】

item.title: 巴里克和纽蒙特首席执行官离职，金银创历史新高
item.description: 纽蒙特公司（Newmont Corp.）和巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp.【原文：Newmont Corp. and Barrick Mining Corp. both announced CEO changes on Monday as bullion soared to a fresh record high, marking a leadership upheaval after years of industry challenges.】

item.title: 随着预测市场蓬勃发展，梦幻体育应用 Sleeper 控告美国商品期货交易委员会
item.description: 梦幻体育应用 Sleeper Markets 指责美国商品期货交易委员会阻挠其成为期货佣金商的努力，而成为期货佣金商是进入赛事预测市场的关键一步。【原文：Fantasy sports app Sleeper Markets accused the US Commodity Futures Trading Commission of thwarting its efforts to become a futures commission merchant, a key step needed to enter the event predictions market.】
